Key Achievement: Launched Chrome with a focus on speed and simplicity
Adoption/Usage: Initial adoption among developers and early tech users
Technical Challenge: Plugin compatibility issues with older websites
Business/Cost Impact: Minimal marketing spend, growth via word of mouth

Key Achievement: Added extensions and the Chrome Web Store
Adoption/Usage: Rapid user base expansion to 30M users
Business/Cost Impact: Revenue began through Google search integration

Key Achievement: Introduced sandboxed tabs and auto-update mechanism
Business/Cost Impact: Increased infrastructure cost for update delivery

Key Achievement: Rolled out Chrome Sync and cloud bookmark support
Technical Challenge: Early sync bugs caused data duplication
Business/Cost Impact: Enhanced user retention boosted ad revenue
